summary.p: An incomplete Piṅkalam (?), starting with iruṭikaḷ peyar and ending with vayattiṉ peyar.
By a Christian copiyst (see Christian blessing).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (November 2021, March 2022).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

supportDesc.condition: Poor state of preservation. Folios truncated.

collation.desc: the front cover. Shelfmark on recto.
14 folios = Piṅkalam. Tamil foliation [1]-14. All folios truncated on the right side. 5-6 columns. f1-f4: more dark. 430 x 30 mm.
1 folio = guard leaf (with drawings and owner's name). No foliation. Double folio. Truncated on both sides. 400 x 30 mm.

layoutDesc.layout: Aṭi-wise distribution (1 aṭi per line) for the invocation (U1). Final letter(s) indented at the end of line (U2).

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 241 (front cover, recto).
Shelfmark in black ink, upside down: N° 7 (f[1]v).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF. 430 x 25 mm.

decoNote.desc: Several drawings on f[1]r (a multi-legged cow?) and f[1]v (2 Christian churches/altar? a horse? two people holding/stretching a fishnet?).

origin.origDate: No internal date. Not later than first mention in a catalogue.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
